messages.title: Want to know what a Tory Government would be like?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative Forest of Dean District Council is rated amongst the ten worst performing councils in the country.

issues.governance: The Conservative Forest of Dean District Council is rated amongst the ten worst performing councils in the country due to Tory infighting and self-interest resulting in service cuts.

housing.content: We will look to increase charges as far as possible beyond inflation so that consumers of the services are bearing the full cost without any hidden subsidy from the taxpayer.

contactInformation.address: Forest of Dean Constituency Labour Party, Regent Hall, Bath Place, Lydney, Glos.

quotes.text: You demonstrate Conservative government. Your values. Represent our party in action.
quotes.source: David Cameron, speech to Conservative Councillors

quotes.text: Conservative Whitehall have much to learn from Conservative town halls.
quotes.source: George Osborne, speech to Conservative Councillors

quotes.text: We do not in principle favour 'free this and free that', such as swimming or transport, school meals or computers or whatever it is.
quotes.source: Southampton Tory Leader Cllr. Alec Samuels

quotes.text: We will look to increase charges as far as possible beyond inflation so that consumers of the services are bearing the full cost without any hidden subsidy from the taxpayer.
quotes.source: Wandsworth Tory Leader Cllr. Eddie Lister

quotes.text: Concerns had been raised about what would happen to private school children if their parents were no longer able to pay their fees. The idea is that we might be able to earmark money to keep a child in a private school.
quotes.source: Tory Bromley Council's portfolio holder for young people Cllr. Noad
